bug.author: xadupre
bug.summary: TreeEnsembleClassifier: base_value not tested, fails for binary classification
bug.description:
Describe the bug If base_value is specified and the number of classes is 2, the score of the second class is constant. System information
OS Platform and Distribution: Windows ONNX Runtime installed from source ONNX Runtime version: 0.4 Python version: 3.7 Visual Studio version 2017

comments.comment: Reopen it because the fix got reverted
